samples.instruction: Maatruththiraanaali (differently abled) students-ku padippu salugaigal enna?
samples.current_output: Benefits: 1) 5% reservation in all courses 2) Full fee waiver in govt colleges 3) Free laptop scheme 4) Special scholarship â‚¹3,000-10,000/month 5) Scribe facility in exams 6) Extra time (20 minutes/hour). UDID card theva. Disability certificate 40%+ irukka venum. Apply through Differently Abled Welfare Department.

samples.instruction: Nursing padippuku (B.Sc Nursing) Tamil Nadu-la admission eppadi?
samples.current_output: Eligibility: +2 Biology 45% marks (SC/ST 40%). Admission: TN Health Department counselling. Steps: 1) Online application 2) Merit list 3) Counselling 4) College allotment. Duration: 4 years. Govt nursing college fee: â‚¹2,000-5,000/year. Job guarantee - govt hospital-la appointment.

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Tamil medium-la padichaa job kidaikkaadhu
samples.current_output: Fact: Fact: Language of education â‰  Job success. Tamil medium students succeed in: Government jobs (TNPSC, SSC), Teaching, Banking, Law, Business. English skill = learnable later. Many successful entrepreneurs, politicians, officers are Tamil medium. Focus: Strong foundation in concepts. English proficiency courses available free. Communication skills matter, not medium of instruction.

samples.instruction: Government school student NEET crack à®ªà®£à¯à®£ à®®à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®¯à¯à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Absolutely yes! 7.5% reservation + determination = success. Resources: 1) Free coaching - Government NEET centres (apply through school) 2) Online free - NPTEL, SWAYAM, YouTube 3) NCERT books sufficient for Biology 4) Previous year papers - NTA website free. Success stories: Many govt school students top NEET. Challenges: English medium switch, lab exposure. Solutions: Tamil medium NEET option available, virtual labs online. Believe in yourself!

samples.instruction: Management quota vs Government quota - à®à®©à¯à®© difference?
samples.current_output: Government quota (65%): Counselling-based merit admission, low fees. Management quota (35%): College direct admission, higher fees (2-5x). NRI quota: Foreign citizen children, highest fees. Reality: Same degree, same placement opportunity. Management quota useful if: Marks low but can afford, specific college wanted, late application. Government quota: Always try first - significant cost savings. Private self-financing colleges: 100% management, higher fees.

samples.instruction: Graphic Design course enge padikkalaam? Job opportunity?
samples.current_output: Training options: 1) Arena Animation 2) MAAC 3) TNSDC multimedia courses 4) Online - Coursera, Skillshare. Tools to learn: Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDraw, Canva. Duration: 3-12 months. Jobs: 1) Graphic designer 2) Social media designer 3) Print designer 4) UI designer 5) Freelancing. Salary: â‚¹12,000-30,000 starting. Portfolio build pannunga. Freelance platforms: Fiverr, Upwork, 99designs.

samples.instruction: Tally course padiththaal enna job kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Tally jobs: 1) Accountant - small/medium businesses 2) Billing operator 3) Inventory manager 4) GST filing assistant 5) Bank data entry. Salary: â‚¹10,000-20,000 starting. Course duration: 2-3 months. Government centres: NIELIT, TNSDC. Private: Tally Academy (authorized). Certification: Tally.ERP 9 / TallyPrime. Combined with GST knowledge = better opportunities. Self-employment: Freelance accounting services.

samples.instruction: Education loan EMI katta mudiyala, enna option?
samples.current_output: Options available: 1) Moratorium extension request - bank will consider 2) EMI restructuring - lower EMI, longer tenure 3) Interest only payment temporarily 4) Parent co-borrower support 5) Government interest subsidy scheme check 6) Loan transfer to lower interest bank 7) Part-time income for EMI contribution. Don't do: Default silently - affects CIBIL score. Do: Communicate with bank proactively. Recovery harassment: Banking Ombudsman complaint.

samples.instruction: ITI-la seera enna documents vendumay? Free training irukkumaa?
samples.current_output: 10th/8th pass pannirukkanum. www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in-la apply pannu/pannunga. Government ITI full free - fee illai, tools, books ellam free. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. June-July-la admission start aagum.

samples.instruction: NEET Physics hard-aa irukku, eppadi improve aavadhu?
samples.current_output: Physics improvement: 1) Concepts first - derivations later 2) Formula list chapter-wise 3) Daily 20-30 numericals practice 4) HC Verma for conceptual clarity 5) DC Pandey for NEET level. High weightage topics: Mechanics, Electrostatics, Modern Physics, Optics. Weak students: Start with easy chapters (Units, Motion, Thermodynamics). Video lectures: Physics Wallah, Unacademy free. Avoid formula memorization without understanding.

samples.instruction: JEE Main & Advanced-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ prepare à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output:
**JEE Preparation Strategy:**

**Class 11 (Foundation Year):**

**Focus Areas:**
- NCERT complete mastery
- Concept clarity > Speed
- Build problem-solving skills
- Regular practice

**Subject Priority:**
1. Maths (Most important for JEE)
2. Physics (Concepts + Numericals)
3. Chemistry (NCERT + Practice)

**Class 12 (Intensive Year):**

**Strategy:**
- Complete syllabus by December
- January: Full revision starts
- March: Mock test series
- April: JEE Main attempt

**Books:**

**Mathematics:**
| Book | Level |
|------|-------|
| NCERT | Foundation |
| RD Sharma | Practice |
| Cengage Series | Advanced |
| Previous Years | Must! |

**Physics:**
| Book | Level |
|------|-------|
| NCERT | Basic |
| HC Verma | Concept Master |
| DC Pandey | Practice |
| Irodov | JEE Advanced |

**Chemistry:**
| Book | Level |
|------|-------|
| NCERT | Must (Inorganic especially) |
| MS Chouhan | Organic |
| OP Tandon | Physical |
| VK Jaiswal | Inorganic |

**Daily Routine:**
```
5:00 AM - Wake up
5:30-8:00 AM - Maths (Most productive time)
8:00-9:00 AM - Break, Breakfast
9:00-1:00 PM - School/Self-study
2:00-5:00 PM - Physics
5:00-6:00 PM - Break
6:00-9:00 PM - Chemistry + Revision
9:00 PM - Dinner
10:00 PM - Sleep
```

**Weekly:**
- Sunday: Full mock test
- Analysis of mistakes
- Weak topic revision

**JEE Advanced Extra:**
- After JEE Main: 2-month intensive
- More complex problems
- Integer type, Matrix match practice

samples.instruction: Fee comparison table
samples.current_output: Engineering: Govt â‚¹50K/year, Private â‚¹1-2 lakh. Medical: Govt â‚¹13.5K/year, Private â‚¹10-20 lakh. Arts/Science: Govt â‚¹2-5K/year, Private â‚¹20-50K. MBA: Govt â‚¹30-50K/year, Private â‚¹2-5 lakh. ITI: Govt Free, Private â‚¹20-40K. Polytechnic: Govt â‚¹1.5-3K/year, Private â‚¹30-50K.

samples.instruction: NEET-ku prepare aaganum, Telugu medium-la padichirukken, mudiyuma?
samples.current_output: Mudiyum! NEET 13 languages-la ezhudhalaam - Telugu option irukku. TN state quota-ku: Native certificate venum OR 10th, 11th, 12th TN-la padichirukka venum. Border areas: Hosur, Krishnagiri students apply pannalam. NCERT Telugu version available. Focus on concepts - language secondary. Many Telugu medium students crack NEET!

samples.instruction: PhD admission Tamil Nadu-la eppadi nadakkudhu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) PG degree 55% marks (SC/ST 50%) 2) UGC NET/CSIR NET/GATE/SLET pass (fellowship-ku) 3) University entrance test + interview. Fellowship: JRF â‚¹31,000/month, SRF â‚¹35,000/month. Part-time PhD working professionals-ku available. Major universities: Anna, Madras, Bharathidasan, Bharathiar.

samples.instruction: Reliance Foundation Scholarship eppadi vaanguvadhu?
samples.current_output: Reliance Foundation Undergraduate Scholarship: UG 1st year students-ku â‚¹2 lakh over 4 years. Eligibility: Family income â‚¹2.5 lakh kizha, JEE/NEET rank holders, 12th 60%+. Selection: Application + Interview. Apply: www.reliancefoundation.org. Scholarship Plus program: Leadership development, mentoring, internships included.

samples.instruction: Friends ellaarum phone use panraanga, study time waste aagudhu, enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Phone/Social media management: 1) Study time-la phone vera room-la vaiyunga 2) App blockers use (Forest, Freedom) 3) Scheduled screen time - 1 hour/day 4) Study group with serious friends 5) Parents-kitta phone control kodunga. Reality: Toppers also use phones - difference is discipline. Educational use OK: BYJU'S, Khan Academy, Doubt clearing. Self-control = life skill. Start with small goals.

samples.instruction: JEE Main vs JEE Advanced - enna difference?
samples.current_output: JEE Main: NITs, IIITs, GFTIs admission. JEE Advanced: IITs only. Eligibility: JEE Main top 2.5 lakh â†’ JEE Advanced eligible. Difficulty: Advanced >> Main. Pattern: Main - 90 Qs, 300 marks, 3 hours. Advanced - 2 papers, 3 hours each, complex patterns. Attempts: Main - 6 (3 years Ã— 2 sessions), Advanced - 2 consecutive years. Strategy: First secure good Main rank, then focus Advanced.

samples.instruction: Defence Jobs-ku ennenna exams irukku? Age limit enna?
samples.current_output:
**Defence Exams:**

**1. NDA:** 12th pass, 16.5-19.5 age, UPSC exam, Males only

**2. CDS:** Degree, 19-25 age, UPSC exam

**3. AFCAT:** Degree 60%, 20-26 age, Air Force

**4. Army:**
- Soldier GD: 10th, 17.5-21 age
- Soldier Clerk: 12th, 17.5-23 age
- Technical: Engineering degree

**5. Navy:** SSC Officer, Sailor entries

**6. Coast Guard:** Navik, Yantrik - 10th/12th

**Physical Standards:**
- Height 157-170 cm
- Vision 6/6 or correctable
- No flat feet

**Preparation:** Written + SSB Interview + Medical + Physical

**Websites:** joinindianarmy.nic.in, joinindiannavy.gov.in

samples.instruction: Free-ya coding katrukkolla online resources enna irukku?
samples.current_output: NPTEL, SWAYAM (government), freeCodeCamp, Codecademy, Khan Academy ellam free. TN government ELCOT training centres-la free computer courses undu. YouTube-la Tamil-la coding tutorials irukku.

samples.instruction: Medical emergency hostel-la vandhaal enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Emergency steps: 1) Call warden immediately 2) College has tie-up hospital - use that 3) 108 ambulance if serious 4) Keep parent contact updated with warden 5) Student health insurance - claim process know 6) ESI hospital if eligible 7) Govt hospital - free emergency care for all. Preparation: Keep emergency contacts, medical history, blood group info with you. Health card carry. Prevention: Regular health checkup, don't ignore symptoms.

samples.instruction: Marks card-la name/DOB wrong, correct panna eppadi?
samples.current_output: Correction process: 1) Apply to examination board (DGE for board exams) 2) Documents: Original marks card, Aadhaar, birth certificate, school bonafide 3) Affidavit (court/notary) 4) Newspaper advertisement (name change) 5) Processing fee â‚¹100-500. Time: 15-30 days. Portal: Online application available on DGE website. For university: Controller of Examinations. Gazette notification: For legal name change.
